name: Stalin vs. Martians
description:
Stalin vs. Martians is a strategy game developed by Black Wing Foundation, N-Game Studios and Dreamlore Games. It came out on 23-04-2009. It was published by Paradox Interactive. Stalin vs. Martians has a Metascore of 25, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Stalin vs. Martians on PC.
